p: dia\ ti/ to\ qala/ttion u)/dwr ou) tre/fei ta\ de/ndra;

p.#text:
po/teron di' h)\n ai)ti/an ou=de\ tw=n zw)|wn ta\ xersai=a;
 zw=|on ga\r e)/ggeion to\ futo\n ei)=nai, oi( peri\ *pla/twna kai\ *)anacago/ran kai\ *dhmo/kriton oi)/ontai:
ou) ga\r dio/ti toi=s e)nali/ois futoi=s tro/fimo/n e)sti kai\ po/timon w(/sper toi=s i)xqu/sin, h)/dh kai\ ta\ e)n th=| xe/rsw| futa/ te kai\ de/ndra tre/fei: ou)/te ga\r e)ndu/etai
 tai=s r(i/zais u(po\ pa/xous ou)/t' a)nafe/retai u(po\ ba/rous: o(/ti d' e)mbriqe/s e)sti kai\ gew=des, a)/llois te polloi=s a)podei/knutai kai\ tw=| ma=llon a)ne/xein kai\ u(perei/dein ta\ ploi=a kai\ tou\s kolumbw=ntas: h)\ ma/lista me\n bla/ptetai chro/thti ta\ de/ndra chrantiko\n

de\ to\ qala/ttion; o(/qen pro/s ge ta\s sh/yeis oi(

a(/les bohqou=si, kai\ ta\ sw/mata tw=n lousame/nwn e)n qala/tth| chra\n eu)qu\s i)/sxei kai\ traxei=an th\n e)pifa/neian.
h)\ to\ me\n e)/laion toi=s futoi=s pole/mion kai\ fqei/rei ta\ prosaleifo/mena; mete/xei de\ pollh=s h(
 qa/latta liparo/thtos: dio\ suneca/ptei, kai\ parainou=men ei)s ta\s flo/gas mh\ e)mba/llein qala/ttion
u(/dwr. h)\ ge/gonen a)/poton kai\ pikro\n to\ u(/dwr, w(s
*)aristote/lhs fhsi/n, a)nami/cei katakekaume/nhs gh=s;

kai\ ga h( koni/a gi/gnetai, gluke/os u(/datos ei)s te/fran
e)mpeso/ntos, h( de\ dia/lusis e)ci/sthsi kai\ fqei/rei to\ xrhsto
 kai\ po/timon, w(s e)n h(mi=n oi( puretoi\ to\
 u(gro
 ei)s xolh
 tre/pousin. a(\ d' i(storou=sin e)n th=|
*)eruqra=| qala/ssh| blasta/nein u(lh/mata kai\ futa/, karpo
 me
 ou)de/na fe/rei tre/fetai de\ toi=s potamoi=s pollh
 e)mba/llousin i)lu/n: o(/qen ou) pro/sw th=s
gh=s a)lla\ plhsi/on e)/xei th
 ge/nesin.

p:
dia\ ti/ ma=llon u(po\ tw=n u(eti/wn h)\ tw=n e)pirru/twn u(da/twn ta\
de/ndra kai\ ta\ spe/rmata pe/fuke tre/fesqai;

p.q:
potamoi=s ga\r di\s toi=s au)toi=s ou)k a)\n
e)mbai/hs

quote.#text: oi)=nos u(po\ floiou= pe/letai sape\n e)n cu/lw| u(/dwr

l: h)= ma/la dei/laiai geneai/, u(/droisin o)/neiar,
au)to/qen e)k li/mnhs pate/res boo/wsi guri/nwn.

p.#text:
po/teron, w(s *lai=tos e)/lege, th=| plhgh=| ta\ o)/mbria diista/nta th\n gh=n po/rous poiei= kai\ diadu/etai ma=llon ei)s th\n r(i/zan h)\ tou=to me\n ou)k a)lhqe/s, a)ll'

                e)/laqe to\n *lai=ton o(/ti kai\ ta\ limnai=a futa/, tu/fh
kai\ fle/ws kai\ qru/on, a)nauch= kai\ a)blasth= me/nei,
mh\ genome/nwn o)/mbrwn kaq' w(/ran to\ de\ tou= *)aristote/lous
a)lhqe/s, o(/ti pro/sfato/n e)sti kai\ ne/on u(/dwr to\ u(o/menon e(/wlon de\ kai\ palaio\n to\ limnai=on;

h)\ kai\ tou=to piqano\n ma=llon h)\ a)lhqe/s e)sti; ta\ ga\r phgai=a kai\ pota/mia na/mata pro/sfata me/n e)sti kai\ neogenh=:   w(/s fhsin *(hra/kleitos, e(/tera e)pirrei=
u(/data tre/fei kai\ tau=ta tw=n xei=ron.

a)=r' ou)=n kou=fo/n e)sti to\ e)k *dio\s u(/dwr kai\ a)erw=des

                kai\ pneu/mati memigme/non o(dhgei=tai te kai\ a)nape/mpetai
taxe/ws ei)s to\ futo\n u(po\ lepto/thtos, dio\ kai\ pomfo/lugas poiei= th=| a)nami/cei tou= a)e/ros: h)\ tre/fei me\n ma/lista kratou/menon u(po\ tou= trefome/nou

( tou=to ga/r e)sti pe/yis: a)peyi/a de\ tou)nanti/on, o(/tan i)sxuro/tera tou= paqei=n kai\ metaba/llon ta\ lepta\ kai\ a(pla= kai\ a)/xuma ma=llon, oi(=o/n e)sti to\ o)/mbrion u(/dwr; gennw/menon ga\r e)n a)e/ri kai\ pneu/mati kaqaro\n kai\ a)mige\s ka/teisi: ta\ de\ phgai=a kai\

th=| gh=| kai\ toi=s to/pois o(moiou/mena, di' w(=n e)/ceisi, pollw=n a)napi/mplatai poioth/twn, di' a(\s h(=tto/n e)stin eu)/trepta kai\ bra/dion au(ta\ pare/xei th=| pe/yei metaba/llein
 ei)s to\ trefo/menon: tw=n d' o)mbri/wn to\ eu)/trepton ai( sh/yeis kathgorou=sin, eu)shpto/tera ga/r

e)sti tw=n potami/wn kai\ freatiai/wn h( de\ pe/yis
e)/oiken ei)=nai sh=yis, w(s *)empedoklh=s marturei= le/gwn
 h)\ pa/ntwn e(toimo/tato/n e)sti kai\ r(a=|ston ai)tia/sasqai
to\ gluku\ tw=n o)mbri/wn kai\ xrhsto/n, e)kpempo/menon

eu)qu\s u(po\ tou= pneu/matos; dio\ kai\ ta\ qre/mmata tou/twn a)polau/ei proqumo/teron, kai\ oi( ba/traxoi
prosdokw=ntes o)/mbron e)pilampru/nousi th\n fwnh\n u(po\ xara=s, w(/sper h(/dusma tou= limnai/ou to\ u(e/tion
 prosdexo/menoi kai\ spe/rma th=s e)kei/nwn gluku/thtos

e(\n ga\r kai\ tou=to poiei=tai shmei=on u(etou= me/llontos
*)/aratos ei)pw/n

p: dia\ ti/ paraba/llousi toi=s qre/mmasin a(/las oi( nomei=s;

p.#text:
po/teron, w(s oi( polloi\ nomi/zousi, plh/qous trofh=s
e(/neka kai\ tou= paxu/nein; th/n te ga\r o)/recin h( drimu/ths e)kkalei=tai kai\ tou\s po/rous a)nastomou=sa ma=llon o(dopoiei= th=| trofh=| pro\s th\n a)na/dosin: dio\
 kai\ tou\s i)sxnou\s kai\ tou\s a)tro/fous *)apollw/nios o(
*(hrofi/leios e)ke/leue mh\ glukei= mhde\ xondrw=| tre/fein
a)lla\ toi=s tarixeutoi=s kai\ u(falmuri/zousin, w(=n h( lepto/ths, w(/sper e)ntri/xwma genome/nh, ta\ siti/a toi=s sw/masi dia\ tw=n po/rwn prosti/qhsin. h)\ ma=llon
u(giei/as e(/neka kai\ sugkoph=s plh/qous to\n a(/la lei/xein
 e)qi/zousi ta\ boskh/mata; nosei= ga\r a)/gan piaino/mena, th\n de\ pimelh\n th/kousin oi( a(/les kai\ diaxe/ousin o(/qen eu)marw=s kai\ r(a|di/ws a)pode/rousin au)ta\ sfa/cantes:
h( ga\r kollw=sa kai\ sunde/ousa to\ de/rma pimelh\ lepth\ kai\ a)sqenh\s ge/gonen u(po\ th=s drimu/thtos.
 leptu/netai de\ kai\ to\ ai(=ma tw=n to\ a(/las leixo/ntwn
 ou)de\ ph/gnutai ta\ e)nto/s,
a(lw=n mige/ntwn.
 sko/pei de/, mh\ kai\ gonimw/tera kai\ proqumo/tera
pro\s ta\s sunousi/as: kai\ ga\r ai( ku/nes ku/ousi taxe/ws ta/rixos e)pesqi/ousai, kai\ ta\ a(lhga\ tw=n ploi/wn
 plei/ous tre/fei mu=s dia\ to\ polla/kis sumple/kesqai.

p: dia\ ti/ tw=n o)mbri/wn u(da/twn eu)alde/stera toi=s spe/rmasi ta\ meta\ brontw=n kai\ a)strapw=n, a(\ dh\ kai\ a)strapai=a kalou=si;

p.#text:
po/teron o(/ti pneumatw/dh dia\ th
 tou= a)e/ros taraxh
 kai\ a)na/micin, to\ de\ pneu=ma th
 u(gro/thta
 kinou=n ma=llon a)nape/mpei kai\ a)nadi/dwsin h)\ bronta\s
 me
 kai\ a)strapa\s poiei= to\ qermo
 e)n tw=| a)e/ri pro\s to\ yuxro
 maxo/menon, dio\ xeimw=nos h(\kista
bronta=| ma/lista d' e)/aros kai\ fqinopw/rou dia\ th
 a)nwmali/an th=s kra/sews, h( de\ qermo/ths; pe/ptousa

to\ u(gro
 prosfile\s poiei= toi=s blasta/nousi kai\
w)fe/limon: h)\ ma/lista me
 e)/aros bronta=| kai\ a)stra/ptei dia\ th
 ei)rhme/nhn ai)ti/an, ta\ d' e)arina\ tw=n u(da/twn a)nagkaio/tera toi=s spe/rmasi pro\ tou= qe/rous, o(/qen
h( plei=ston u(ome/nh tou= e)/aros xw/ra kaqa/per h( e)n
*sikeli/a| pollou\s kai\ a)gaqou\s karpou\s a)nadi/dwsin;

dia\ ti/ tw=n xumw=n, o)ktw\ tw=| ge/nei o)/ntwn, e(/na mo/non, to

a(lmuro/n, a)p' ou)deno\s karpou= gennw/menon o(rw=men; kai/toi kai\ to
 pikro
 h( e)lai/a fe/rei prw=ton kai\ to
 o)cu
 o( bo/trus,:
 ei)=ta metaba/llwn o( me
 gi/netai liparo\s o( d' oi)nw/dhs: metaba/llei
de\ kai\ o( strufno\s e)n tai=s foinikobala/nois kai\ o(
au)sthro\s e)n tai=s r(o/ais ei)s to
 gluku/n: e)/niai de\ r(o/ai kai\
 mh=la to
 o)cu
 a(plw=s fe/rousin, o( de\ drimu\s e)n tai=s r(i/zais kai\ spe/rmasi polu/s e)sti.

l: pikrh/n, h(/ oi( pollo\n a)po\ krato\s kela/ruze

p.#text:
po/teron ou)=n ou)k e)/stin a(lmurou= ge/nesis a)lla\ fqora\ tw=n a)/llwn to\ a(lmuro/n, dio\ kai\ pa=sin a)/trofon
 toi=s. a)po\ futw=n kai\ sperma/twn trefome/nois,
 h(/dusma d' e)ni/ois gi/netai tw=| to\ plh/smion a)fairei=n tw=n trefo/ntwn : h)/, kaqa/per th=s qala/tths e(/yontes a)fairou=si to\ a(luko\n kai\ dhktiko/n, e)n toi=s qermoi=s u(po\ qermo/thtos e)camaurou=tai to\ a(lmuro/n: h)\ xumo\s

me/n e)stin, w(s *pla/twn ei)=pen, u(/dwr h)qhme/non dia\ futou=, dihqoume/nh de\ kai\ qa/latta to\ a(lmuro\n a)poba/llei; gew=des ga\r kai\ paxumere/s e)stin, o(/qen o)ru/ttontes para\ to\n ai)gialo\n e)ntugxa/nousi poti/mois libadi/ois, polloi\ de\ kai\ khri/nois a)ggei/ois
 a)nalamba/nousin e)k th=s qala/tths u(/dwr gluku\ dihqou/menon, a)pokrinome/nou tou= a(lukou= kai\ gew/dous:
h( de\ di' a)rgi/lou prodiagwgh\ panta/pasi th\n qa/lattan
 dihqoume/nhn po/timon a)podi/dwsi tw=| kate/xein
e)n e(auth=| kai\ mh\ diie/nai to\ gew=des. ou(/tw de\
 tou/twn e)xo/ntwn, ei)ko/s e)sti ta\ futa\ mh/t' e)/cwqen a)nalamba/nein a(lmuri/da mh/t', a)\n e)n au)toi=s la/bh| ge/nesin, e)kkri/nein ei)s to\n karpo/n: oi( ga\r po/roi dia\ lepto/thta to\ gew=des kai\ paxumere\s ou) dihqou=sin.
h)\ th=s pikro/thtos ei)=dos th\n a(lmuro/thta
 qete/on, w(s *(/omhros
;
 kai\ o( *pla/twn fhsi\n a)mfote/rous r(u/ptein kai\ a)poth/kein tou\s xumou/s, h(=tton de\ tau=ta poiei=n to\n
a(luko\n kai\ ou) traxu\n ei)=nai: do/cei de\ to\ pikro\n tou= a(lukou= chro/thtos u(perbolh=| diafe/rein, e)pei\

chrantiko/n e)sti kai\ to\ a(luko/n.

p: dia\ ti/ toi=s sunexw=s dia\ tw=n dedrosisme/nwn de/ndrwn badi/zousi le/pran i)/sxei ta\ yau/onta th=s u(/lhs mo/ria tou= sw/matos;

p.#text:
po/teron, w(s *lai=tos e)/lege, th=| lepto/thti to\ drosw=des
 u(gro\n a)pocu/ei tou= xrwto/s: h)/, kaqa/per e)rusi/bh toi=s u(grainome/nois e)ggi/gnetai spe/rmasin, ou(/tws u(po\ th=s dro/sou tw=n e)pipolh=s xlwrw=n kai\ a(palw=n a)naxarassome/nwn kai\ a)pothkome/nwn a)/xnh tis a)piou=sa
 tou= si/nontos a)napi/mplhsi prosxeome/nh toi=s a)naimota/tois
 me/resi th=s sarko/s, oi(=a knh=mai kai\ po/des, kai\ a)mu/ssei kai\ da/knei th\n e)pifa/neian; o(/ti ga\r fu/sei ti dhktiko\n e)/nesti th=| dro/sw|, marturei= to\ tou\s pi/onas i)sxnote/rous poiei=n: ai( gou=n pi/ones gunai=kes; i(mati/ois h)\ e)ri/ois a(paloi=s a)nalamba/nousai th=s dro/sou

dokou=si sunth/kein th\n polusarki/an.

p:
dia\ ti/ ta\ ploi=a xeimw=nos e)n toi=s potamoi=s plei= bra/dion, e)n
de\ th=| qala/tth| ou) paraplhsi/ws;

p.#text:
po/teron o( pota/mios a)h\r a)ei\ duski/nhtos w)\n kai\
 baru\s e)n de\ xeimw=ni ma=llon paxuno/menos dia\ th\n

peri/yucin, e)mpodw/n e)sti toi=s ple/ousin : h)\ tou=to
 ma=llon tou= a)e/ros pa/sxousin oi( potamoi/; e)lau/nousa ga\r h( yuxro/ths to\ u(/dwr poiei= baru\ kai\ swmatw=des,
w(s e)/stin e)n tai=s kleyu/drais katamaqei=n: bra/dion
 ga\r e(/lkousi xeimw=nos h)\ qe/rous: e)n de\ *qra/|kh| peri\ to\ *pa/ggaion i(storei= *qeo/frastos ei)=nai krh/nhn, a)f' h(=s tau)to\ ge/mon a)ggei=on u(/datos i(sta/menon xeimw=nos e(/lkein dipla/sion staqmo\n h)\ qe/rous. o(/ti d' 
h( pukno/ths tou= u(/datos th\n braduth=ta poiei= tou=
 plou=, dh=lo/n e)sti tw=| plei/ona go/mon fe/rein ta\ pota/mia ploi=a tou= xeimw=nos: to\ ga\r u(/dwr ma=llon a)nterei/dei pukno/teron kai\ baru/teron gigno/menon, th\n de\ qa/lattan h( qermo/ths kwlu/ei puknou=sqai,
di' h(\n ou)de\ ph/gnutai: ma/lkh ga\r e)/oiken ei)=nai

pu/knwsis.

p:
dia\ ti/, tw=n a)/llwn u(grw=n e)n tw=| kinei=sqai kai\ stre/fesqai yuxome/nwn, th\n qa/lattan o(rw=men e)n tw=| kumatou=sqai qermote/ran
gignome/nhn;

p.#text:
h)= tw=n me
 a)/llwn u(grw=n e)peiso/dion ou)=san kai\ a)llotri/an e)ci/sthsin h( ki/nhsis th
 qermo/thta kai\ diaforei=, th
 de\ th=s qala/tths su/mfuton ou)=san e)kripi/zousi ma=llon oi( a)/nemoi kai\ tre/fousi; martu/ria
de\ th=s qermo/thtos h( diau/geia kai\ to\ mh\
 ph/gnusqai, kai/per ou)=san gew/dh kai\ barei=an.

p: dia\ ti/ tou= xeimw=nos h(=tton pikra\ gi/gnetai geuome/nois h( qa/latta; tou=to ga/r fasi kai\ *dionu/sion i(storei=n to\n u(dragwgo/n.

p.#text:
h)= o(/ti pantelw=s me\n e)/rhmos ou)k e)/sti gluku/thtos
 ou)d' a)/moiros h( pikro/ths, a(/te dh\ potamou\s tosou/tous u(podexome/nhs th=s qala/tths: tou= d' h(li/ou
to\ gluku\ kai\ po/timon e)cairou=ntos u(po\ koufo/thtos
 e)pipola/zon kai\ ma=llon e)n tw=| qe/rei tou=to poiou=ntos,
e)n de\ tw=| xeimw=ni malakw/teron a(ptome/nou di' a)sqe/neian qermo/thtos, u(poleipome/nh moi=ra pollh=s gluku/thtos a)ni/hsi to\ a)kra/tws pikro\n kai\ farmakw=des; tou=to d' h(suxh= kai\ toi=s poti/mois sumbe/bhke:
qe/rous ga\r ponhro/tera gi/gnetai, to\ koufo/taton
 kai\ gluku/taton tou= qermou= diaforou=ntos, e)n de\ xeimw=ni ne/on e)pirrei= kai\ pro/sfaton, ou(= mete/xein a)na/gkh kai\ th\n qa/lattan, seiome/nhn a(/ma kai\ tw=n potamw=n e)pidido/ntwn.

po/teron h( qermo/ths
bohqei= pro\s th\n peri/yucin,

h)\ au)th\ e)ci/sthsi ma/lista to\n oi)=non a)posbennu/ousa
 kai\ fqei/rousa th\n du/namin: h)\ to\ u(datw=des kai\
pneumatw=des tou= oi)/nou pro\s metabolh\n e)pisfale/stat'
e)/xon i(/sthsi ta\ gew/dh pefuko/ta stu/fein kai\ katisxnai/nein, oi( d' a(/les meta\ th=s qala/tths leptu/nontes
 kai\ a)poth/kontes ta/llo/trion kai\ peritto\n
 ou)k e)w=si duswdi/an ou)de\ sh=yin e)ggi/gnesqai: pro\s
de\ tou/tois, o(/son e)sti\ paxu\ kai\ gew=des, e)mpleko/menon toi=s barute/rois kai\ sugkataspw/menon u(posta/qmhn poiei= kai\ tru/ga to\n d' oi)=non a)polei/pei
 kaqaro/n;

p: dia\ ti/ ma=llon nautiw=si th\n qa/lattan ple/ontes h)\ tou\s potamou/s, ka)\n e)n galh/nh| ple/wsi;

p.#text:
h)= o(/ti ma/lista nauti/an kinei= tw=n ai)sqh/sewn h(
 o)/sfrhsis, tw=n de\ paqw=n o( fo/bos; kai\ ga\r tre/mousi kai\ fri/ttousi kai\ koili/as e)cugrai/nontai fantasi/an kindu/nou labo/ntes: tou/twn d' ou)de/teron e)noxlei= toi=s dia\ potamou= ple/ousin: h( ga\r o)/sfrhsis panti\ poti/mw| kai\ glukei= sunh/qhs e)sti\n o( de\ plou=s

a)ki/ndunos, e)n de\ th=| qala/tth| th\n t' o)smh\n a)hqei/a|
 dusxerai/nousi kai\ fobou=ntai, mh\ pisteu/ontes tw=| paro/nti peri\ tou= me/llontos: ou)de\n ou)=n o)/felos th=s galh/nhs, a)lla\ kai\ h( yuxh\ sa/lon e)/xousa kai\ qoruboume/nh sugkinei= kai\ a)napi/mplhsi to\ sw=ma

th=s taraxh=s

p: dia\ ti/ th=s qala/tths e)lai/w| katarrainome/nhs gi/gnetai katafa/neia kai\ galh/nh;

p.#text:
po/teron, w(s *)aristote/lhs fhsi/, to\ pneu=ma th=s
 leio/thtos a)polisqa/non ou) poiei= plhgh\n ou)de\ sa/lon:

h)\ tou=to me\n piqanw=s ei)/rhtai pro\s ta\ e)kto/s, e)pei\ de\
fasi kai\ tou\s katakolumbw=ntas, o(/tan e)/laion ei)s to\ sto/ma labo/ntes e)kfush/swsin, e)n tw=| buqw=| fe/ggos i)/sxein kai\ di/oyin, ou)k e)/stin e)kei= pneu/matos o)/lisqon
 ai)tia/sasqai; sko/pei dh\ mh\ th\n qa/lattan gew/dh kai\ a)nw/malon ou)=san e)cwqei= kai\ diaste/llei th=| pukno/thti tou)/laion, ei)=t' a)natrexou/shs ei)s au(th\n kai\ sustellome/nhs a)polei/pontai po/roi metacu\ tai=s o)/yesi diau/geian kai\ katafa/neian dido/ntes. h)\ fu/sei

me/n e)sti fwteino\s u(po\ qermo/thtos o( th=| qala/tth|
katamemigme/nos a)h/r, gi/gnetai de\ taraxqei\s a)nw/malos kai\ skiw/dhs: o(/tan ou)=n th\n a)nwmali/an e)pilea/nh|
 pukno/thti tou)/laion, a)polamba/nei th\n o(malo/thta
 kai\ th\n diau/geian;

p:
dia\ ti/ xeimw=nos ma=llon h)\ qe/rous ta\ tw=n a(lie/wn sh/petai
di/ktua, kai/toi ta\ g' a)/lla ma=llon e)n tw=| qe/rei tou=to pa/sxei;

p.#text:
po/teron, w(s *qeo/frastos oi)/etai, tw=| yuxrw=| to\ qermo\n u(poxwrou=n a)ntiperii/statai kai\ qermo/tera
 poiei= ta\ e)n ba/qei th=s qala/tths, w(/sper th=s gh=s: dio\ kai\ ta\ phgai=a tw=n u(da/twn xliarw/tera tou=

xeimw=no/s e)sti kai\ ma=llon a)tmi/zousin ai( li/mnai kai\
oi( potamoi/: kataklei/etai ga\r ei)s ba/qos h( qermo/ths
 u(po\ tou= yuxrou= krath/santos: h)\ sh=yis me\n ou)k e)/sti tw=n diktu/wn, o(/tan de\ fri/ch| kai\ pagh=| dia\ to\ yu=xos
 a)nachraino/mena kai\ qrupto/mena ma=llon u(po\ tou= klu/dwnos sh/yei tini\ kai\ mudh/sei pa/sxei paraplh/sion; kai\ ga\r ponei= ma=llon e)n kru/ei, kaqa/per ta\ neu=ra sunteino/mena spara/ttetai, pleona/kis e)ktarattome/nhs dia\ to\n xeimw=na th=s qala/tths: dio\ kai\
 stu/fousin au)ta\ tai=s bafai=s kai\ puknou=si, fobou/menoi ta\s a)nalu/seis: e)pei\ mh\ bafe/nta mhde\ xrisqe/nta, ma=llon a)\n e)la/nqane tou\s i)xqu=s, e)na/eron ga\r to\ tou= li/nou xrw=ma kai\ a)pathlo\n e)n qala/tth|.

p: dia\ ti/ *dwriei=s eu)/xontai kakh\n xo/rtou sugkomidh/n;

p.#text:
h)= kakw=s me\n sugkomi/zetai xo/rtos u(o/menos;
 ko/ptetai ga\r ou) chro\s a)lla\ xlwro/s, w(/ste sh/petai taxu\ dia/broxos geno/menos: u(o/menos de\ pro\ tou= qe/rous o( si=tos bohqei=tai pro\s ta\ qerma\ kai\ no/tia

pneu/mata: tau=ta ga\r ou)k e)a=| puknwqh=nai sunista/menon
e)n tw=| sta/xui to\n karpo/n, a)ll' e)ci/sthsi kai\ diaxei= th=| qermo/thti th\n ph=cin, a)\n mh\ bebregme/nhs th=s gh=s u(gro/ths parame/nh| yu/xousa kai\ noti/zousa
to\n sta/xun.

p: dia\ ti/ purofo/ros h( pi/wn kai\ baqei=a xw/ra, kriqofo/ros de\ ma=llon h( lepto/gews;

p.#text:
h)= o(/ti tw=n sperma/twn ta\ i)sxura\ plei/onos trofh=s

                dei=tai ta\ d'  a)sqenh= lepth=s kai\ e)lafra=s,: a)sqene/steron
d' h( kriqh\ kai\ mano/teron: o(/qen ou) fe/rei th\n pollh\n trofh\n kai\ barei=an; marturei= de\ tw=| lo/gw| tou/tw| purou= to\n tri/mhnon e)n toi=s u(poch/rois fu/esqai be/ltion, a)notw/teron o)/nta kai\ trofh=s e)la/ttonos
 deo/menon: dio\ kai\ suntelei=tai ta/xion.

quote.#text: si=ton e)n phlw=| fu/teue, th\n de\ kriqh\n e)n ko/nei;

p.#text: dia\ ti/ le/getai

po/teron, w(s ei)rh/kamen, o( me\n du/natai plei/onos
 trofh=s katakratei=n h( d' ou) fe/rei to\ polu\ kai\ kataklu/zon,
h)\ pukno\s w)\n o( puro\s kai\ culw/dhs fu/etai be/ltion e)n u(grw=| malatto/menos kai\ xulou/menos, th=|

de\ kriqh=| dia\ mano/thta su/mforon e)n a)rxh=| to\ chro/teron,
h)\ dia\ qermo/thta su/mmetros kai\ a)blabh\s; h(
 kra=sis yuxro/teron d' h( kriqh/: h)\ fobou=ntai to\n puro\n e)n chrw=| tri/bein dia\ tou\s mu/rmhkas, eu)qu\s ga\r e)piti/qentai, ei)s de\ kriqa\s h(=tton fe/rontai, dusba/staktoi ga/r ei)si kai\ dusparako/mistoi dia\ me/geqos;

p:
dia\ ti/ tw=n a)rre/nwn i(/ppwn ma=llon h)\ tw=n qhleiw=n ta\s tri/xas
ei)s th\n o(rmia\n lamba/nousi;

p.#text:
po/teron, w(s toi=s a)/llois to\ a)/rren tou= qh/leos

                me/resi, kai\ tai=s qrici\n eu)tonw/tero/n e)stin: h)\ ma=llon dia\ to\ ou)=ron oi)/ontai ta\s tri/xas tw=n qhleiw=n brexome/nas gi/gnesqai xei/ronas;

p: dia\ ti/ teuqi\s fainome/nh shmei=o/n e)sti mega/lou xeimw=nos;

p.#text:
h)= pa/nta fu/sei ta\ mala/kia du/sriga dia\ gumno/thta th=s sarko\s kai\ yilo/thta, mh/t' o)stra/kw| mh/te de/rmati mh/te lepi/di skepome/nhs a)ll' e)nto\s e)xou/shs
to\ sklhro\n kai\ o)stew=des, dio\ kai\ ke/klhtai mala/kia; taxu\ dh\ proaisqa/netai di' eu)pa/qeian tou= xeimw=nos:
 o(/qen o( me\n polu/pous ei)s gh=n a)natre/xei kai\ tw=n petridi/wn a)ntilambano/menos shmei=o/n e)sti pneu/matos
 o(/son ou)/pw paro/ntos, h( de\ teuqi\s e)ca/lletai, feu/gousa to\ yu=xos kai\ th\n e)n ba/qei taraxh\n th=s qala/tths: kai\ ga\r e)/xei ma/lista tw=n malaki/wn

eu)/qrupton kai\ a(palo\n to\ sarkw=des.

p: dia\ ti/ th\n xro/an o( polu/pous e)calla/ttei;

quote.#text: tou= me\n ga/r te kakou= tre/petai xrw/s:

l.#text: poulu/podos no/on i)/sxe poluxro/ou, o(\s poti\ pe/trh|,

quote.#text: gnou\s o(/ti pa/ntwn ei)si\n a)porroai\ o(/ss' e)ge/nonto:

p.#text:
po/teron, w(s *qeo/frastos w)/|eto, deilo/n e)sti fu/sei
zw=|on o(/tan ou)=n taraxqh=| trepo/menon tw=| pneu/mati,

summetaba/llei to\ xrw=ma kaqa/per a)/nqrwpos: dio\ kai\ le/lektai

                h)\ tou=to pro\s th\n metabolh\n piqanw=s le/lektai pro\s
de\ th\n e)comoi/wsin ou)x i(kanw=s; metaba/llei ga\r

ou(/tws, w(/ste th\n xro/an ai(=s a)\n plhsia/zh| pe/trais
 o(moiou=n: pro\s o(\ kai\ *pi/ndaros e)poi/hse 
 kai\ *qe/ognis
 tou=to dh\ kai\ tou\s panourgi/a| kai\ deino/thti u(perfe/rontas e)/xein to\ e)pith/deuma le/gousin, w(s u(pe\r tou= laqei=n kai\ diafugei=n tou\s plhsi/on e(autou\s a)ei\ a)peika/zein polu/podi. h)\ kaqa/per e)sqh=ti th=| xro/a|
 nomi/zousi xrh=sqai, r(a|di/ws ou(/tws h(=| bou/letai metenduo/menon;

a)=r' ou)=n th\n me\n a)rxh\n au)to\s e)ndi/dwsi tou= pa/qous dei/sas, ta\ de\ ku/ria th=s ai)ti/as e)n
a)/llois e)sti/; sko/pei dh/, kat' *)empedokle/a
 
               ou) ga\r zw/|wn mo/non ou)de\ futw=n ou)de\ gh=s kai\ qala/tths, a)lla\ kai\ li/qwn a)/peisin e)ndelexw=s polla\ r(eu/mata kai\ xalkou= kai\ sidh/rou: kai\ ga\r fqei/retai
 pa/nta kai\ o)/dwde tw=| r(ei=n a)ei/ ti kai\ fe/resqai sunexw=s: kai\ ga\r e(/lceis h)\ e)piphdh/seis poiou=si tai=s
a)porroai=s, oi( me\n e)mploka\s au)tw=n oi( de\ plhga\s
oi( d' w)/seis tina\s kai\ periela/seis u(potiqe/menoi.
 ma/lista de\ tw=n para/lwn petrw=n e)pirrainome/nwn
 kai\ yhxome/nwn u(po\ th=s qala/tths, a)pie/nai me/rh kai\ qrau/smata polla\ kai\ lepta\ ei)ko\s sunexw=s, a(\
toi=s xrw/masin a)llh/lwn diafe/ronta toi=s me\n a)/llois
ou) prosi/sxetai sw/masin a)lla\ lanqa/nei periolisqa/nonta
 tw=n puknote/rous e)xo/ntwn po/rous h)\ diekqe/onta tw=n manote/rous. o( de\ polu/pous th/n te sa/rka prosidei=n au)to/qen a)nqrhniw/dhs kai\ polu/poros kai\ dektiko\s a)porrow=n e)stin: o(/tan de\ dei/sh|,
tw=| pneu/mati trepo/menos kai\ tre/pwn oi(=on e)/sfigce

to\ sw=ma kai\ sunh/gagen, w(/ste prosde/xesqai kai\ ste/gein e)pipolh=s ta\s tw=n e)ggu\s a)porroa/s: kai\ ga\r
h( traxu/ths meta\ th=s malako/thtos e(/likas pare/xousa
 toi=s e)piferome/nois me/resi mh\ skedannume/nois a)ll' a)qroizome/nois kai\ prosme/nousi, su/gxroun a)perga/zetai
 th\n e)pifa/neian toi=s e)ggu/tat' ou)=sin. tekmh/rion
de\ th=s ai)ti/as me/ga to\ mh/te tou=ton pa=sin
 e)comoiou=sqai toi=s plhsi/on mh/te to\n xamaile/onta toi=s leukoi=s xrw/masin, a)lla\ mo/nois e(ka/teron, w(=n tai=s
a)porroai=s po/rous summe/trous e)/xousin.

p: dia\ ti/n' ai)ti/an to\ tw=n a)gri/wn suw=n da/kruon h(du\ to\ de\ tw=n e)la/fwn a(lmuro/n e)sti kai\ fau=lon;

quote.#text: fri/cas eu)= lofih/n, pu=r o)fqalmoi=si dedorkw/s:

p.#text:
ai)ti/a de\ qermo/ths kai\ yuxro/ths tou/twn, kai\ yuxro\n me\n o( e)/lafos peri/qermon de\ kai\ purw=des
o( su=s: o(/qen to\ me\n feu/gei to\ d' a)mu/netai tou\s

e)pio/ntas, o(/te kai\ ma/lista dia\ to\n qumo\n e)kba/llei
to\ da/kruon pollh=s ga\r e)pi\ ta\ o)/mmata qermo/thtos
ferome/nhs, w(s ei)/rhtai
 gluku\ gi/gnetai to\ a)pothko/menon. e)/nioi de/ fasin,

w(/sper ga/laktos o)rro/n, tou= ai(/matos taraxqe/ntos, e)kkrou/esqai to\ da/kruon, w(s *)empedoklh=s. e)pei\ toi/nun traxu\ kai\ me/lan to\ tw=n ka/prwn ai(=ma dia\ qermo/thta lepto\n de\ kai\ u(dare\s to\ tw=n e)la/fwn,
 ei)ko/tws kai\ to\ a)pokrino/menon e)n toi=s qumoi=s kai\
 toi=s fo/bois e(kate/rou toiou=ton.

quote.#text: mhke/ti nukto\s u(/ein, h(=| ken te/kh| a)grote/rh su=s.

p.#text:
dia\ ti/ tw=n u(w=n ai( me
 h(/meroi, pleona/kis ti/ktousi kai\ kat' a)/llon a)/llai xro/non, ai( d' a)/griai kai\ a(/pac kai\ peri\ ta\s
au)ta\s a(/pasai sxedo
 h(me/ras; au(=tai d' ei)si
 a)rxome/nou
 qe/rous: dio\ kai\ le/lektai

quote.#text: tw=|  de/ ti kai\ po/qos ei)/te dia\ pe/yews a)mmi/sgwn:

p.#text:
h)= dia\ plh=qos trofh=s, o)/ntws   a)fqoni/a ga\r trofh=s to\ go/nimon peri/ttwma poiei= kai\ futoi=s kai\ zw/|ois: ai( me\n ou)=n a)/griai di' au(tw=n kai\ meta\ fo/bou th\n trofh\n zhtou=si, tai=s d'
 h(me/rois u(pa/rxei dia\ panto\s h( me\n au)tofuh\s h( d'
 e)k paraskeuh=s. h)\ to\ th=s sxolh=s kai\ a)sxoli/as a(/ma sumbai=non ai)/tion; ai( me\n ga\r a)rgou=si, mh\ boulo/menai po/rrw plana=sqai tw=n suforbw=n, ai( d' o)reibatou=sai kai\ periqe/ousai th\n trofh\n diaforou=si kai\

katanali/skousin ei)s to\ sw=ma pa=san: w(/ste dia\ to\ a)ei\ sunei=nai h)\ mh\ gi/nesqai peri/ttwma , h)\ kai\
to\ suntre/fesqai kai\ sunagela/zesqai ta\ qh/lea toi=s a)/rresin, a)na/mnhsin poiei= tw=n a)frodisi/wn kai\ sunekkalei=tai th\n o)/recin w(s e)p' a)nqrw/pwn *)empedoklh=s

e)poi/hse
 e)n de\ toi=s a)gri/ois, a)potro/fois ou)=sin a)llh/lwn, to\
 a)/storgon kai\ dusepi/mikton a)mblu/nei kai\ a)nasbe/nnusi ta\s o(rma/s. h)\ kai\ to\ lego/menon u(p' *)aristote/lous

a)lhqe/s e)stin, o(/ti   *(/omhros w)no/mase
 su=n to\n mo/norxin; tw=n ga\r plei/stwn fhsi\ prosknwme/nwn toi=s stele/xesi qru/ptesqai tou\s o)/rxeis.

dia\ ti/ th=s a)/rktou fasi\ th\n xei=ra glukuta/thn e)/xein sa/rka
 kai\ fagei=n h(di/sthn;

h)= o(/ti ta\ pe/ttonta th\n trofh\n ma/lista tou=
sw/matos pare/xei to\ kre/as h(/diston; pe/ttei de\ ka/llista
to\ diapne/on, kinou/menon ma/lista kai\ suggumnazo/menon,
w(/sper h( a)/rktos tw=| me/rei tou/tw|

                plei=sta kinei=tai: kai\ ga\r w(s posi\ toi=s e)mprosqi/ois badi/zousa xrh=tai kai\ tre/xousa kai\ w(s xersi\n a)ntilambanome/nh.

p: dia\ ti/ dusti/beutos h( tou= e)/aros w(/ra;

p.#text:
po/teron ai( ku/nes, w(/s fhsin *)empedoklh=s,
 ta\s a)porroa\s a)nalamba/nousin, a(\s e)napolei/pei ta\ qhri/a th=| u(/lh|, tau/tas de\ tou= e)/aros e)camaurou=si kai\ sugxe/ousin ai( plei=stai tw=n futw=n kai\ tw=n
 u(lhma/twn o)smai/, u(pe\r th\n a)/nqhsin u(perxeo/menai kai\ kerannu/menai, peripotw=si kai\ diaplanw=si ta\s
 ku/nas th=s tw=n qhri/wn o)smh=s e)pilabe/sqai; dio\ peri\
 th\n *ai)/tnhn e)n *sikeli/a| fasi\ mhde/na kunhgei=n: polu\ ga\r a)nafu/esqai kai\ teqhle/nai di' e)/tous i)/on o)reino\n
e)n toi=s leimw=si, kai\ to\n to/pon eu)wdi/an a)ei\ kate/xousan a(rpa/zein
ta\s tw=n qhri/wn a)napnoa/s. le/getai

de\ mu=qos, w(s th\n *ko/rhn e)kei=qen a)nqologou=san
o( *plou/twn a)farpa/seie, kai\ dia\ tou=to timw=ntes kai\ sebo/menoi to\ xwri/on w(s a)/sulon ou)k e)piti/qentai toi=s e)kei= nemome/nois.

p: dia\ ti/ peri\ ta\s panselh/nous h(/kista tai=s i)xnoskopi/ais e)pitugxa/nousin;

p.#text:
dia\ th\n ei)rhme/nhn ai)ti/an; drosobo/loi ga\r ai(
 panse/lhnoi: dio\ kai\ th\n dro/son o( *)alkma\n *dio\s qugate/ra kai\ *selh/nhs prosei=pe poih/sas
 
               
h( ga\r dro/sos a)sqenh/s e)sti kai\ a)dranh\s o)/mbros, a)sqene\s de\ kai\ to\ th=s selh/nhs qermo/n: o(/qen e(/lkei me\n a)po\ gh=s w(/sper o( h(/lios, a)/gein d' ei)s u(/yos mh\
 duname/nh mhd' a)nalamba/nein meqi/hsin.

p: dia\ ti/ to\ dro/simon geno/menon dia\ tou= yu/xous dusti/beuton;

p.#text:
po/teron o(/ti ta\ qhri/a po/rrw tw=n koitw=n o)knou=nta
proi+e/nai dia\ to\ kru/os ou) polla\ poiei= shmei=a: dio\
kai/ fasin au)ta\ fei/desqai tw=n plhsi/on, o(/pws mh\

                kakopaqh=| planw/mena makra\n tou= xeimw=nos a)ll'
 a)ei\ e)ggu/qen e)/xh| ne/mesqai: h)\ dei= mh\ mo/non e)/xein i)/xnh to\n stibeuo/menon to/pon a)lla\ kinei=n th\n o)/sfrhsin, kinei= de\ luo/mena kai\ xalw/mena malakw=s u(po\ qermo/thtos, h( d' a)/gan peri/yucis phgnu/ousa ta\s
 o)sma\s ou)k e)a=| r(ei=n ou)de\ kinei=n th\n ai)/sqhsin: o(/qen kai\ ta\ mu/ra kai\ to\n oi)=non h(=tton o)/zein yu/xous kai\ xeimw=nos le/gousin: o( ga\r a)h\r phgnu/menos i(/sthsi ta\s o)sma\s e)n au(tw=| kai\ ou)k e)a=| a)nadi/dosqai;
dia\ ti/ ta\ zw=|a ta\s bohqou/sas duna/meis, o(/tan e)n pa/qei ge/nhtai, zhtei= kai\ diw/kei kai\ xrw/mena polla/kis w)felei=tai;

kaqa/per ai( ku/nes e)sqi/ousi po/an, i(/na th\n xolh\n e)cemw=sin:

ai( d' u(/es e)pi\ tou\s potami/ous karki/nous fe/rontai, bohqou=ntai ga\r e)sqi/ousai pro\s kefalalgi/an: h( de\ xelw/nh fagou=sa

th\n sa/rka tou= e)/xews o)ri/ganon e)pesqi/ei: th\n d' a)/rkton le/gousin a)swme/nhn tou\s mu/rmhkas a)nalamba/nein th=| glw/tth| kai\ katapi/nousan a)palla/ttesqai: tou/twn d' ou)/te pei=ra kai\
peri/ptwsis ge/gonen au)toi=s.

po/teron ou)=n, w(/sper ta\ khri/a th\n me/littan th=|

o)smh=| kai\ ta\ kene/breia to\n gu=pa kinei= kai\ prosa/getai po/rrwqen, ou(/tws ou)=n kai\ su=s oi( karki/noi kai\ th\n xelw/nhn h( o)ri/ganos, ai( de\ murmhkiai\ th\n a)/rkton o)smai=s kai\ r(eu/masi prosfere/si kai\ oi)kei/ois
e(/lkousin, ou) logismw=| tou= sumfe/rontos a)gou/shs th=s
 ai)sqh/sews: h)\ ta\s o)re/ceis e)pife/rousi toi=s zw/|ois ai( tw=n swma/twn kra/seis, a(\s ai( no/soi poiou=si, diafo/rous
               
drimu/thtas h)\ gluku/thtas h)/ tinas a)/llas e)nti/ktousai
poio/thtas a)h/qeis kai\ a)to/pous, tw=n u(grw=n trepome/nwn; w(s dh=lo/n e)stin e)pi\ tw=n gunaikw=n, o(/tan ku/wsi, kai\ li/qous kai\ gh=n prosferome/nwn
 dio\ kai\ tw=n nosou/ntwn tai=s o)re/cesin oi( xari/entes i)atroi\ proi+/sasi tou\s a)sw/tws h)\ swthri/ws e)/xontas:
i(storei= gou=n *mnhsi/qeos i)atro\s e)n a)rxh=| pneumoni/as to\n e)piqumh/santa krommu/wn sw/|zesqai to\n de\ su/kwn a)po/llusqai, dia\ to\ tai=s kra/sesi ta\s o)re/ceis ta\s

                de\ kra/seis toi=s pa/qesin e(/pesqai. piqano\n ou)=n e)sti kai\ tw=n qhri/wn ta\ mh\ pantelw=s o)leqri/ois mhd' a)nairetikoi=s peripi/ptonta nosh/masi tau/thn th\n dia/qesin kai\ kra=sin i)/sxein, u(f' h(=s e)pi\ ta\ sw/|zonta
 fe/retai kai\ a)/getai tai=s o)re/cesin e(/kaston au)tw=n.

p: dia\ ti/ to\ gleu=kos, a)\n u(po\ yu/xous perie/xhtai to\ a)ggei=on, gluku\ diame/nei polu\n xro/non;

p.#text:
po/teron o(/ti pe/yis e)sti\ tou= gleu/kous h( ei)s to\
oi)nw=des metabolh\ kwlu/ei de\ th\n pe/yin h( yuxro/ths,
 u(po\ qermou= ga\r h( pe/yis: h)\ tou)nanti/on, oi)kei=o/s e)sti th=s stafulh=s xumo\s o( gluku/s, dio\ kai\ pepai/nesqai le/getai to\ gluku\ kirnw/menon h( de\ yuxro/ths
 ou)k e)w=sa diapnei=n a)lla\ sune/xousa to\ qermo/n, th\n gluku/thta diathrei= tou= gleu/kous; au(/th d' e)sti\n
 ai)ti/a kai\ tw=n trugwme/nwn o)/mbrw| to\ gleu=kos h(=tton a)nazei=n: h( ga\r ze/sis u(po\ qermo/thtos th\n de\ qermo/thta kate/xei kai\ suste/llei to\ yuxro/n.

p: dia\ ti/ tw=n qhri/wn h( a)/rktos h(/kista diesqi/ei ta\ di/ktua, kai/toi kai\ lu/koi kai\ a)lw/pekes diesqi/ousi;

p.#text:
po/teron e)ndota/tw tou\s o)do/ntas e)/xousa tou=
 xa/smatos h(/kista pro\s ta\ li/na e)ciknei=tai, proempi/ptei
 ga\r ta\ xei/lh dia\ pa/xos kai\ me/geqos: h)\ ma=llon i)sxu/ousa tai=s xersi\ r(h/gnusi kai\ diaspa=| to\n bro/xon: h)\ kai\ tai=s xersi\n a(/ma xrh=tai kai\ tw=| sto/mati, tai=s me\n diaspw=sa to\ li/non tw=| d' a)munome/nh
 tou\s diw/kontas; ou)deno\s d' h(=tton au)th=| bohqou=sin
ai( perikalindh/seis: dio\ ma=llon h)\ diaspa=n ta\ li/na pragmateuome/nh polla/kis e)kkubista=| kai\ sw/|zetai,
 a)mh\ kai\ de/oi h( tw=n o)do/ntwn.

Cur inter omnes arbores sola palma contra impositum onus adsurgit?

Utrum quod ignea et spirabilis
facultas, qua maxime pollet, quum tentatur

et irritatur, sese exercens magis et magis erigit?
An quoniam pondus ramos subito urgens, aerem
omnem qui in hi est, oppressum cedere retro cogat,
qni deinde resumptis paullo viribus, adversum

onus aerius rursus instat: An molles et tenerae
virgae impetum non sustinentes, quum onus quiescit,
paullatim se erigunt, et speci:m, quaei contra
illud adsurgant, praebent?
Quare aqua de puteis hausta minus alit quam quae de fonte aut caelo manat?

An quia frigidior
magis sit et parum quoque aeris habeat: An
quod salis multum immixta sibi de terra habeat;
sal autem maciem, si quid aliud, facit: An quod
pigra nec cursu exercita, qualitatem a. liquam malam

adquirat, quae stirpibus et animantibns contraria,
in cansa cst quod nec bene concoquatur
nec nutrire quicquam possit: Hinc et stagnantes
aquae minus probae cenaentur, quod injuriae quae
vel ab aeris mala qualitate vel a terra accipiunt,

digerere nequeant.

quote.#text: Nos quoque cum Zephyri curramus flatibus una?

p.#text:
Cur Zephyrus ventorum omnium celerrimus vulgo 
fertur, et Homerus:

An quod aere perpurgato et minime nebuloso,

fiare soleat? aeris enim densitae et impuritas ventorum
cursum non mediocriter impedit. An quod
sol radiis suis fiatum frigidum perstringens, quo
velocius feratur, auctor est? Ouicquid enim frigidi

ventorum vi contrahitur, id a calore veluti hoste
supcratum, longius et citius propelli credendum est.
Cur apes fumum ferre nequeant?

Quod meatus
spiritus vitalis sane quam angustos habeant. At
is fumo interceptus et conclusus angit et propemodum

ad mortem apes adigit. An acredo amaritudoque
fumi in causa eεt: gaudent enim dulcibus
apes neqae alio nutrimento uluntur: itaque ut contrariam
et noxiam rem propter amaritudinεm, fumum
detestantur. Ωua de causa mellarii quum

fumum abigendis apibus faciunt, amaras herbae, ut
cicutam et centanrium, incendere solent.
Cur apes citius pungunt qui stuprum dudum fecerunt?

l.#text: confer ad Anchisen, ubi quercus atque cypirus

l: crascit, apum strepit atque domus mellifiua bombis.

p.q:
Parvula favorum fabricatrix, quae
Rhoecum pupugisti aculeo, domans illius perfidiam.
p.#text:
An quod animul estmunditiae et elegantiae
perquam studiosum; praeterea olfactus sensu valet

plurimum? Quum itaque impuri congressus propter
impudicitiam et immoderatam libidinem soleant
esae immundiores: et citius ab apibus deprehenduntur
et odium vehementius adversus illos concipiunt.
Unde apud Theocritum jocose *wenus ad

Anchisen a paetore ab: egatur, uti apuin aeuleis
propter adulterium commisanm pungatur:

Et Pindarus:
Cur lupae certo anni tempore omnes intra duodecim dies pariunt?

An quia neque cogitatione comprehendere

quicquam nec reminisci (quibus solus homo
virtutibus vulet' potest? itaque quum mente non
discernat a quo injuria fuerit illata, id tantum. quod
ob oculos minaciter versatur, inimicum eεse existimat
deque eo vindictam sumere parat. An lapidem,

dum per terram mittitur, ferarn aliquam esse autumans,
pro ingenio hanc prius capere conatur, deinde
quum viderit se opinione sua frustrari, hominem
rursus invadit? An quod ad id quod missum
fuerit, et hominem ipsum aequaliter odit, et id quod

proximius est, insectatur?
Quare canes relicto homine qui jecit, lapidum morsu insectantur?

Antipater in libro de Animalibus
partum lu: as projicere adaerit, quum glandiferae
arbores fiorem abjiciunt, quo gustato, uteri
illarum reserantur: quum ejus copia non eεt, partum

in ipso corpore emori, nec in lucem venire posse:
praeterea regiones illas a Iupis non vaetari, quae
glandium quercuumque feraces non sunt. Quidam
ad fabulam Latonae referunt; quae quum uterum

ferret nec aepiam tuta prae Junone esae posset,
duodecim  diebus, quibus in Delum proficiscebatur,
in lupum a Iove mutata, ut deinceps omnes lupae
eo ipso tempore parere possint, impetravit.
Cur aqua in summa parte alba, in fundo vero nigra spectatur?

l: et niger in fundo fiuvii color exstat ab umbra,
atque cavernosis itidem spectatur in antris.

p.#text:
An quod profunditae nigredinis
mater est, ut quae solis radios prius quam ad eam
descendant, obtundat et Iabefactet? Superficies
autem, quoniam continuo a sole afficitur, candorem
luminis recipiat oportet. Quod ipsum et Empedocles

approbat:

An limo p: erumque oppletus fluminum marisque
fundus, talem de se colorem per solis refiexum

parit, quali utique is praeditus est? An probabilius
est, aquam minime, quae illis est, puram et sinceram
esse, sed terrea qualitate (utpote quae continuo,
qua currit vel agitatur, aliquid ex ea advehat' imbutam, quum ad fundum residet, turbidiorem et

minus perspicuam efficit?
